data_table.description: Cohort Event Eligibility Form. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: CELB05
variable.description: [Identifying information]. Source used to identify event. Q5 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB06
variable.description: [Identifying information]. Is this a death? Q6 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB13A
variable.description: Was an autopsy performed? Q13.A (Q.6.A on version E) [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB11A
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index or face sheep]. Is a 402, 410-414, 427, 428, or 518.4 code listed? Q11a [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB11A1
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index or face sheep]. Is a 00.50 - 00.54, 00.61-00.66, 35-39, 88.5, 89.49, 99.10 250, 390-459, 745-747, 794.3, 798, or 799 code listed? Q11a1 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB11A2
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index or face sheep]. Any of following mentioned in discharge summary: myocardial infarction, coronary heart disease, etc? Q11a2 Acute: myocardial infarction, angina, chest pain, ischemic heart disease, coronary heart disease, unstable angina, cardiac arrest, atherosclerotic heart disease. Or during this admission: CCU Care, Nitroglycerin, Cardiac Catheterization, CABG, Elevated CK MB, Coronary Angiography or Angioplasty, Thrombolytic therapy for coronary occlusion [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB11B
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index or face sheep]. 430-436 (>=1997) Or 430-438 (<1997). Q11b [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB11B1
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index or face sheep]. 00.50-00.54, 00.61-00.66, 35-39, 88.5, 89.49, 99.10, 250, 390-459, 745-747, 794.3, 798, Or 799 Code Listed. Q11b1 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB11B2
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index or face sheep]. Are any of the following mentioned or suggested in the discharge summary? Q11b2. Acute: stroke, transient ischemic attack, cerebral infarction, cerebrovascular disease, aphasia, diplopia, cerebral embolus, lacunar (syndrome infarction), dysarthria, paralysis, cerebral hemorrhage, subarachnoid hemorrhage. Or during this admission: carotid endarterectomy, cerebral angiography, CT/MRI scan showing cerebrovascular findings, carotid stent placement, neuro ICU care, thrombolytic therapy for cerebral occlusion [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB11F
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index or face sheep]. Is a 398.91, 402.01, 402.11, 402.91, 404.01, 404.03, 404.11, 404.13, 404.91, 404.93, 415.0, 416.9, 425.4, 428, 518.4, 786.0 code listed? Q11f [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB11F1
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index or face sheep]. Is a 00.50 - 00.54, 00.61 -00.66, 35-39, 88.5, 89.49, 99.10, 250, 390-459, 745-747, 794.3, 798, or 799 code listed? Q11f1 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB11F2
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index or face sheep]. Are any of the following mentioned or suggested in the discharge summary? Q11f2. Acute: heart failure, cardiomyopathy, orthopnea, congestive heart failure, ventricular failure, paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea, pump failure, impaired systolic function, cardiomegaly, jugular venous distension, left ventricular dysfunction, pulmonary Edema. Or during this admission: heart biopsy, automatic implantable cardioverter defibrillator (AICD) check, implantation of cardiac resynchronization pacemaker (CRT) [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB12
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index or face sheep]. Is this event an in-hospital death? Q12 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB14B
variable.description: [Information from death index/certificate]. Is the code E10-E14, I10, I11, I20-I25, I46-I51, I70, I97 (exclude I97.2), J81, J96, R96, R98, or R99? Q14b [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB15A
variable.description: [Forms of abstract]. Needs hospitalized myocardial infarction abstraction (CFD, CHI, HRA). Q15a [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB15B
variable.description: [Forms of abstract]. Needs hospitalized stroke abstraction (CFD; copy materials for STR). Q15b [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB15C
variable.description: [Forms of abstract]. Needs hospitalized heart failure abstraction (CFD, CHI, HFA). Q15c [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB15D
variable.description: [Forms of abstract]. Needs out-of-hospital death investigation (IFI, PHQ, DTH). Q15d [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB15E
variable.description: [Forms of abstract]. Needs death certificate abstraction (DTH). Q15e [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB19A
variable.description: [Forms of abstract]. Was this event reported in the corresponding annual follow-up for this participant? Q19a [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELBFLAG
variable.description: =1 If CELB1 (or later version) is present [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB15
variable.description: [Forms of abstract]. Event eligible. Q15 [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB16
variable.description: Event not eligible. Q16 (deleted on version E) [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB11C
variable.description: [Information from hospital discharge index or face sheep]. Is a 35-9,88.5,250,390-459,745-7,794.3, 798, or 799 code listed? Q11c (deleted in version E) [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]

variable.name: CELB17
variable.description: Event is death and not eligible. Q17 (deleted on version E) [Cohort Event Eligibility Form]
